greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (1<=k<=n) given by T(n, 1) = T(n,n) = 1, otherwise T(n, k) = (m*n-m*k+1)*T(n-1,k-1)+(m*k-m+1)*T(n-1,k), where m = 5.
link: G. Strasser, Generalisation of the Euler adic, Math. Proc. Camb. Phil. Soc. 150 (2010) 241-256, Triangle A_5(n,k).
maple: A142460 := proc(n, k) if n = k then 1; elif k > n or k < 1 then 0 ; else (5*n-5*k+1)*procname(n-1, k-1)+(5*k-4)*procname(n-1, k) ; end if; end proc:
mathematica: m=5; ( Pascal level: k=N-1) A[n_, 1] := 1; A[n_, n_] := 1; A[n_, k_] := (m*n - m*k + 1)A[n - 1, k - 1] + (m*k - (m - 1))A[n - 1, k]; a = Table[A[n, k], {n, 10}, {k, n}]; Flatten[a]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 19 2008
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 08 2013, May 11 2013
